de.ftbastler.bukkitgames.api

Class PlayerAccessKitEvent

  • Object
    • Event
      • PlayerAccessKitEvent

  • public class PlayerAccessKitEvent
extends Event
    This event is called everytime the plugin checks if a player can access a kit. You could use this event for doing a "Free to play" day etc.
